Delfinen.data

Class ModelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Delfinen.data.ModelController

  • public class ModelController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelController()
      The ModelController creates a new instance of the DataFileAccessor, sets Model object to the content of the file or creates a new empty file, if no file exists.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCompetitionResult(int memberID, java.util.Date date, DisciplineType diciplineType, Distance distance, int timeInSec, int placement, java.lang.String eventName)
      This method adds a CompetitionResult object in the ArrayList contained in // * the Competition object belonging to a Member object (specified by memberID), saves the Member object in the Model object and writes the Model object to the file

      java.util.ArrayList<MemberCompetitive> getTop5Competition(DisciplineType disciplineType, Distance distance, java.util.ArrayList<MemberCompetitive> members)
      This method looks at each MemberCompetitve object saved in the Model object and calls the getBestCompetitionRes(disciplineType, distance) for each MemberCompetitve object, returning the CompetitionResult, specified by the given enums, whit the lowest timeInSec.
      java.util.ArrayList<MemberCompetitive> getTop5Training(DisciplineType disciplineType, Distance distance, java.util.ArrayList<MemberCompetitive> members)
      This method looks at each MemberCompetitve object saved in the Model object and calls the getBestTraining(disciplineType, distance) for each MemberCompetitve object, returning the TrainingSession, specified by the given enums, whit the lowest timeInSec.

      • addTrainingSession

        public void addTrainingSession(int memberID,
                               java.util.Date date,
                               DisciplineType diciplineType,
                               Distance distance,
                               int timeInSec)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method adds a TrainingSession object in the ArrayList contained in the Training object belonging to a Member object (specified by memberID), saves the Member object in the Model object and writes the Model object to the file
        Parameters:
        memberID, - int unique to a specific Member object
        date, - Date object
        diciplineType, - Enum
        distance, - Enum
        timeInSec, - int representing time in seconds
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error in the filewriting occurs.

      • addCompetitionResult

        public void addCompetitionResult(int memberID,
                                 java.util.Date date,
                                 DisciplineType diciplineType,
                                 Distance distance,
                                 int timeInSec,
                                 int placement,
                                 java.lang.String eventName)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        This method adds a CompetitionResult object in the ArrayList contained in // * the Competition object belonging to a Member object (specified by memberID), saves the Member object in the Model object and writes the Model object to the file
        Parameters:
        memberID - int unique to a specific Member object
        date, - Date object
        diciplineType, - enum
        distance, - enum
        timeInSec, - int representing time in seconds
        placement, - int representing placement
        eventName, - String name of event
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error in the filewriting occurs.

      • getTop5Training

        public java.util.ArrayList<MemberCompetitive> getTop5Training(DisciplineType disciplineType,
                                                              Distance distance,
                                                              java.util.ArrayList<MemberCompetitive> members)
        This method looks at each MemberCompetitve object saved in the Model object and calls the getBestTraining(disciplineType, distance) for each MemberCompetitve object, returning the TrainingSession, specified by the given enums, whit the lowest timeInSec. MemberCompetitve objects who return that TrainingSession object are added to a temporary ArrayList, sortList. Using the java.util.Comparator compare method, the sortList is sorted by each MemberCompetitive objects lowest timeInSec. Then up to 5 MemberCompetitive objects are added to the final ArrayList in the sorted order
        Parameters:
        disciplineType, - enum
        distance, - enum
        members, - ArrayList of all MemberCompetitive objects saved in the Model object
        Returns:
        top5, sorted ArrayList containing up to 5 MemberCompetitive objects

      • getTop5Competition

        public java.util.ArrayList<MemberCompetitive> getTop5Competition(DisciplineType disciplineType,
                                                                 Distance distance,
                                                                 java.util.ArrayList<MemberCompetitive> members)
        This method looks at each MemberCompetitve object saved in the Model object and calls the getBestCompetitionRes(disciplineType, distance) for each MemberCompetitve object, returning the CompetitionResult, specified by the given enums, whit the lowest timeInSec. MemberCompetitve objects who return that CompetitionResult object are added to a temporary ArrayList, sortList. Using the java.util.Comparator compare method, the sortList is sorted by each MemberCompetitive objects lowest timeInSec. Then up to 5 MemberCompetitive objects are added to the final ArrayList in the sorted order
        Parameters:
        disciplineType, - enum
        distance, - enum
        members, - ArrayList of all MemberCompetitive objects saved in the Model object
        Returns:
        top5, sorted ArrayList containing up to 5 MemberCompetitive objects
